ðŸ“– Summary: The mcp-send-email repository provides an MCP server that enables sending emails directly from Cursor or Claude Desktop using Resend's API. It allows users to send plain text and HTML emails, schedule emails, add CC and BCC recipients, configure reply-to addresses, and customize the sender email. This eliminates the need to copy and paste email content, streamlining the email sending process.
